part.content: CHAPTER II : AUTHORITIES UNDER THIS ACT. Sec. 3 - 9.
CHAPTER IIA : NOTICE OF CHANGE. Sec. 9A - 9B.
CHAPTER IIB : REFERENCE OF CERTAIN INDIVIDUAL DISPUTES TO GRIEVANCE SETTLEMENT AUTHORITIES. Sec. 9C.
CHAPTER III: REFERENCE OF DISPUTES TO BOARDS, COURTS OR TRIBUNALS. Sec. 10 - 10A.
CHAPTER IV : PROCEDURE, POWERS AND DUTIES OF AUTHORITIES. Sec.11 - 21.
CHAPTER V : STRIKES AND LOCK-OUTS. Sec. 22 - 25.
CHAPTER VA : LAY-OFF AND RETRENCHMENT. Sec. 25A - 25J.
CHAPTER VB : SPECIAL PROVISIONS RELATING TO LAY-OFF, RETRENCHMENT AND CLOSURE IN CERTAIN ESTABLISHMENTS. Sec. 25K - 25S.
CHAPTER VC : UNFAIR LABOUR PRACTICES. Sec. 25T - 25U.
